verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>
"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> toward<WH413> the sons<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> them,

and say<WH559> to the sons<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> 'Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH136> God!<WH3068> Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> you said,<WH559> 'Aha!<WH1889>' against<WH413> My sanctuary<WH4720> when<WH3588> it was profaned,<WH2490> and against<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478> when<WH3588> it was made<WH8074> desolate,<WH8074> and against<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> when<WH3588> they went<WH1980> into exile,<WH1473>

therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am going to give<WH5414> you to the sons<WH1121> of the east<WH6924> for a possession,<WH4181> and they will set<WH3427> their encampments<WH2918> among you and make<WH5414> their dwellings<WH4908> among you; they will eat<WH398> your fruit<WH6529> and drink<WH8354> your milk.<WH2461>

"And I shall make<WH5414> Rabbah<WH7237> a pasture<WH5116> for camels<WH1581> and the sons<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> a resting<WH4769> place<WH4769> for flocks.<WH6629> Thus you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>"

'For thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> you have clapped<WH4222> your hands<WH3027> and stamped<WH7554> your feet<WH7272> and rejoiced<WH8055> with all<WH3605> the scorn<WH7589> of your soul<WH5315> against<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478>

therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I have stretched<WH5186> out My hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> you, and I shall give<WH5414> you for spoil<WH957> to the nations.<WH1471> And I shall cut<WH3772> you off<WH3772> from the peoples<WH5971> and make you perish from the lands;<WH6> I shall destroy<WH776> you. Thus you will know<WH8045> that I am the Lord.<WH3045> "

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> Moab<WH4124> and Seir<WH8165> say,<WH559> 'Behold,<WH2009> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> is like all<WH3605> the nations,<WH1471>'

therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am going to deprive<WH6605> the flank<WH3802> of Moab<WH4124> of [its] cities,<WH5892> of its cities<WH5892> which are on its frontiers,<WH7097> the glory<WH9469> of the land,<WH776> Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon, and Kiriathaim,<WH7156>

and I will give<WH5414> it for a possession,<WH4181> along<WH5921> with the sons<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> to the sons<WH1121> of the east,<WH6924> that the sons<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983> may not be remembered<WH2142> among the nations.<WH1471>
"Thus I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on Moab,<WH4124> and they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> Edom<WH9000> has acted<WH6213> against the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> by taking<WH5358> vengeance,<WH5359> and has incurred<WH816> grievous<WH816> guilt,<WH816> and avenged<WH5358> themselves upon them,"

therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will also stretch<WH5186> out My hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> Edom<WH9000> and cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from it. And I will lay<WH5414> it waste;<WH2723> from Teman<WH8487> even to Dedan<WH1719> they will fall<WH5307> by the sword.<WH2719>

"And I will lay<WH5414> My vengeance<WH5360> on Edom<WH9000> by the hand<WH3027> of My people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478> Therefore, they will act<WH6213> in Edom<WH9000> according to My anger<WH639> and according to My wrath;<WH2534> thus they will know<WH3045> My vengeance,<WH5360>" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Because<WH3282> the Philistines<WH6430> have acted<WH6213> in revenge<WH5360> and have taken<WH5358> vengeance<WH5359> with scorn<WH7589> of soul<WH5315> to destroy<WH4889> with everlasting<WH5769> enmity,<WH342>"

therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Behold,<WH2009> I will stretch<WH5186> out My hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> the Philistines,<WH6430> even cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the Cherethites<WH3774> and destroy the remnant<WH6> of the seacoast.<WH7611> <WH3220>

"And I will execute<WH6213> great<WH1419> vengeance<WH5360> on them with wrathful<WH2534> rebukes;<WH9640> and they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068> when I lay<WH5414> My vengeance<WH5360> on them."' "
